detectors.description:

	- Banther.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Banther.sol#67-69)

	- Banther.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Banther.sol#71-75)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
